hangle: 아직 헤일론에서 추가로 도착한 소식은 없나?
first_translate: have there been any updates from hairoun?

hangle: 예, 그래서 헤일론으로 향할 채비는 예정대로 진행하고 있습니다.
first_translate: no, your highness.  that’s why we’re preparing for our trip as planned.
I see...

hangle: 앞으로도 다른 소식이 있다면 내 쪽으로 먼저 알릴 수 있도록 해.
first_translate: if you hear anything else, let me know first.
fiona will probably call me cowardly if she finds out about this,
but I have no choice.
it took some convincing just to get her to agree on three days of preparation time.

hangle: 다음 날 바로 떠나겠다는 것을 겨우 설득해서 얻었으니까.
first_translate: she wanted us to leave right away without making proper preparations at all.

hangle: 제대로 된 준비도 없이 급히 내려보낼 뻔했지.
first_translate: she wanted us to leave right away without making proper preparations at all.
do you think she has decided whom she’ll take along yet?

hangle: 내내 아벨과 내 문제로 혼란스러워 하던데.
first_translate: she seemed quite confused because of what happened between abel and myself.

hangle: 정말 날 두고 갈 생각이라면 어떻게 해야 할까.
first_translate: what would I do if she really decides not to bring me along?
then I’d simply make my own decision.
make my own decision?
(bad idea.)

hangle: 다른 경우는 몰라도 이번에는 정말 양보할 수 없다.
first_translate: this is one thing I can’t compromise on.
or maybe I could try begging her--
mmph...
siegren...?
fiona, are you awake now?
did something happen while I was asleep?
siegren...
was flirting around with other ladies...

hangle: 말도 안 되는 소리 하지 말고.
first_translate: stop saying such nonsense.

hangle: 너무 얄미워서 입 맞추고 싶은 수준이네….
first_translate: that makes me want to kiss him so badly...
last time, you told me to be nice to them yourself.
and I won’t do it again if you don’t like it.
uh-huh...
now that things turned out this way...
fiona,
who did you meet at the banquet hall last night?
oh...
the person who sent me those strange love letters before...
love letters?
it doesn’t matter anymore.
pretend to sleep...
oops...
when someone asks me how I’m doing,
my habit is to say “I’m fine” when they seem concerned.
I thought I wouldn’t feel bothered by it today though.

hangle: 그래도 보통 때보다 판단력이 떨어지긴 했어.
first_translate: still, my judgment isn’t very good these days.
let’s grill her slowly.
tell me honestly, fiona.
what happened yesterday?
about the letter?
yesterday...
I met the man who wrote me those weird love letters...
what was his name?
um...
bill curtis...
these are the documents needed for work, your grace.

hangle: 아주 급한 것들은 아니니까, 적당히 정리만 부탁해요.
first_translate: they aren’t urgent matters, but please look over them whenever possible.

hangle: 예, 아가씨. 그런데, 정말 이대로 가셔도 괜찮으시겠습니까?
first_translate: of course, lady fiona. however, are you certain you wish to go looking like that?
you appear rather pale...

hangle: 괜찮아요, 어제 파티에서부터 감기 기운이 조금 있어서요.
first_translate: I’m alright. I’ve had a cold since the party last night.

hangle: 내가 두 번 다시 술을 마시면 개다, 진짜….
first_translate: I swear never to drink alcohol ever again...
not only does my memory keep skipping here and there,
celine helps fiona change clothes

hangle: 술기운에 시그렌에게 전부 말해버린 것 같은데…
first_translate: but I also spilled everything to siegren after getting drunk...

hangle: 애인이 미인계 좀 썼다고, 술술 부는 꼬락서니라니…
first_translate: using beauty tactics against his girlfriend and then acting nonchalant afterward...

hangle: 아니, 하지만 그렇게 웃으면서 살살 달래는 건 반칙이지…!
first_translate: wait, but he shouldn’t smile and comfort me like that either...!
fiona.
we were originally supposed to depart tonight.
is it okay to move up our departure time to evening instead?
ah, siegren. you came quickly.

hangle: 아무래도 더 지체할 수는 없을 것 같아서
first_translate: I don’t believe we can delay any further,
so we’ll head off once everyone finishes their preparations.
are you still unwell?
do you remember what happened yesterday?
of course I do...!
to use beauty tricks on a drunken woman...

hangle: 하여간, 미인계에 넘어가다니 헤일론 후계자로 아직 부족하네.
first_translate: in any case, falling prey to beauty tricks proves you’re not ready to become heir of hairoun.

hangle: 그게 지금 이 시점에서 할 말이야?
first_translate: is that really what you need to tell me right now?
hmm...
why am I going back to hairoun anyway?

hangle: 그래서, 가져간 정보는 어떻게 처리하셨나요, 전하?
first_translate: how did you deal with the information I gave you, your highness?

hangle: 내가 과연 어떻게 처리했을 것 같아?
first_translate: how do you think I dealt with it?

hangle: 응? 무려 연애편지를 몰래 숨기고 있던 아가씨.
first_translate: hm? coming from miss secret-love-letter-keeper herself.
he must definitely be upset!
please tell me you didn’t kill him...

hangle: 아니야, 빌 커티스란 남자에 대해 조사 중이지.
first_translate: no, I’m investigating more into this bill curtis fellow.

hangle: 아무리 보아도 영 뒤가 구린 인간이더군.
first_translate: from what I saw, he seems suspicious.
good...

hangle: 그렇지 않아도 그가 마물에 관해 이상한 말을 했다는 게 마음에 걸렸거든.
first_translate: even I felt uneasy hearing him talk strangely about monsters.

hangle: …요즘 네가 좀 달라진 것 같아서 걱정이야.
first_translate: lately, I noticed you changed somewhat.
you became much more serious toward others.
it might be due to being flustered about abel too,

hangle: 예전에는 이렇게 변했으면 좋겠다고 생각한 적도 있는데…
first_translate: but even though I used to hope you’d change like this someday...

hangle: 막상 네가 일희일비하니 별로인 것 같기도 하고.
first_translate: now that you actually have, I find it unpleasant somehow.
that’s why I worry about you.
fiona, you’ll need me.
at least, that’s what I think.
as you said earlier, the best option...
don’t you think it’s time to give me your answer?

hangle: 적어도 지금 곁에 붙어 계신 황자 전하보다
first_translate: I’m far more worthy than the prince standing beside you right now.

hangle: 분명 제가 훨씬 가치 있을 테니까요.
first_translate: I’m far more worthy than the prince standing aside you right now.
did I...

hangle: 네게도 같은 이야기를 하게 만든 걸까?
first_translate: ...make you say the same thing to me?
with your presence alone, you’ll help not only me,
but the people living there as well.

hangle: 최선의 선택 중에서 널 두고 간다는 선택지는
first_translate: leaving you behind wasn’t part of choosing the best option.
it never was.
but I hoped the reason for that choice...

hangle: 네가 이 일에 '필요'하기 때문은 아니었으면 했어.
first_translate: ...wasn’t because you’re necessary for this mission.

hangle: 이런 마음으로 시그렌과 함께하려는 게 아니었는데.
first_translate: I didn’t mean to stay with siegren for this reason.

hangle: …너와 함께하고 싶은 다른 이유를 생각해 보려고 했어.
first_translate: I tried thinking of another reason to accompany you...

hangle: 빌 커티스의 그 말이 더 거슬렸던 건.
first_translate: 106bill curtis’ words annoyed me even more.

hangle: 그걸 인정하고 싶지 않아서 였을지도 몰라.
first_translate: perhaps it was because I refused to acknowledge them.
fiona,

hangle: 그럼 나는 네게 옆에 있고 싶지만 필요는 없는 사람이야?
first_translate: does that mean I’m someone you want by your side but don’t necessarily need?
no, that’s not what I meant...!
ah...
being needed...
why do you consider that bad?

hangle: 나도 네가 내 곁에 필요해. 피오나.
first_translate: I need you by my side too, fiona.
just like abel needs you right now.
and...

hangle: 애초에 선택지 중에 나를 두고 가는 게 없었다면…
first_translate: if leaving me behind wasn’t among your options,
that means we’re heading together, correct?
I got swept away again...

hangle: 취하지도 않았는데 왜 이렇게 되는 거야…
first_translate: why does this always happen even when I’m sober...?
rather than using beauty tactics, this feels more like force...
gunter...
gunter was there.

hangle: 권터가 나중에 의뢰하면 뭐든 다 들어주겠다고…!
first_translate: he promised to grant whatever request I made later on...!
let’s hurry and go find him, siegren!
